about_the_game:
Explore the campaign or challenge your friends in this strategy game set in a fantasy land. Inspired by retro turn-based strategy games, it tries to build upon the formula by adding RPG elements and other features. Build armies, explore territory, and fight for resources. Once the player gets accustomed to its mechanics the game allows for improvisation and complex tactics.

Choose between the four factions of The Order, Nature, Chaos, or The Cult of the Dead which offer distinct gameplay. Whether you choose the brute strength of The Order or the corpse manipulations of The Cult you can bolster your army by hiring neutral creatures offering you what your specialized ones are lacking. Compliment this with spellcasting from your Hero and you too can achieve victory through superior firepower!

The Story So Far...


In an unknown land you are left alone to figure out where you are, where you came from, and who the Heck just unleashed the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse to bring upon the end of the world. Exploring the world while it's still standing you will find out who the warring factions are and rally troops to bring peace to the land. Stop by and hug trees to heal nature, find out who is constantly following you, and ultimately learn whether the Earth is truly flat and carried on the back of a giant turtle.

Features


- four distinct factions
- 85 creatures to command
- 250+ abilities
- 24 powerful spells
- secrets to explore
- hotseat multiplayer
- 16 skirmish maps
- best sidekick (comes free of charge)
- penguins


Music used for the trailer: "Gothic" by "zero-project"; under CCA 4.0 license

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains cartoon violence, dark humour and rarely some crude language might be present.

short_description: A new power is rising on Flat Earth! Figure out who the villain is in this old-school turn-based strategy game and save its mostly innocent denizens with the help of the world's most unhelpful sidekick. Explore secrets, fight bizarre enemies and test your wits in this fantasy adventure!
